title: The Writer's Almanac - Tuesday, November 23, 2021
description: On this date in the year 534 B.C.E., Thespis reportedly became the first Western actor to portray a character onstage. Prior to that theater was chorus based storytelling.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: On this date in the year 534 B.C.E., Thespis reportedly became the first Western actor to portray a character onstage. Prior to that theater was chorus based storytelling.
